page.title: 17KINGFISHER POOL, KINGSTON
page.content: The{Kingfisher}is one of Kingston's latests amusements. It is a large modern swimming pool and squash centre. The swimming pool is the main thing and has a wave machine. You can hire water bikes and sunbeds and the pool has some large floating mats. The pool is designed like a beach, it starts shallow and goes deeper and deeper as you go in. There is also a shallow learners pool which is a bit warmer than the main swimming pool. There is also a cafe with arcade games where you can go after swimming.
